ABA 2009 adult mouse brain parcellation.Title: The Allen Reference Atlas: A Digital Color Brain Atlas of the C57BL/6J Male Mouse
ABA 2009 adult mouse brain parcellation.Definition: Parcellation scheme developed by Dong et al. (2009) for the Allen Brain adult mouse atlas.  This date is based on the version 1.0 of the ontology in Bioportal http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/40133, the date of which is listed as 2009.  Note that visualizations from the Scalable Brain Atlas list this atlas as ABA 2007.
